title: Elfred Street, Paddington
content:
The goal was to refresh a charming yet dated corner terrace in Paddington, transforming it into a warm, functional, and stylish home for a growing family. The vision centred on blending the home’s historic character with modern comforts, preserving its architectural soul while updating it for contemporary family living.

Inhaus Living approached the project with a deep respect for the terrace’s heritage, carefully preserving original details while seamlessly introducing modern elements. The design strategy was guided by a balance of timeless charm and fresh sophistication.

Modern Kitchen: The kitchen was transformed into a stylish centrepiece with crisp white cabinetry, playful mint green appliances, and gold fixtures, creating a bright, welcoming space for everyday living.

Updated Bathrooms: Soft neutrals, marble-look tiles, and sleek brass fittings brought calm and elegance to the bathrooms, echoing the kitchen’s palette for a seamless, refined feel.

Light-Filled, Family-Centred Design: A soft, cohesive palette, open layout, and thoughtful details like the sunlit nursery and inviting courtyard, enhance natural light and flow, creating a calm and connected space for family living.

The completed apartment in Bellevue Hill is now a serene, light filled home with a calm yet sophisticated feel.

The finished home is a lovely mix of old and new, bright and welcoming, designed with family life in mind. It blends classic features with modern comforts to create a timeless and cozy space that’s perfect for the next chapter of a young family’s life.

Homes | Apartments | Kitchens | Bathrooms | Flooring | Construction
